snippet: Despite a series of initial offerings being withdrawn recently in Asia, the Malaysian palm oil giant Felda Global Venture Holdings appears to be filling order books ahead of pricing its I.P.O. on Wednesday, in what would be the world's second-biggest...
abstract: Despite a series of initial offerings being withdrawn recently in Asia, the Malaysian palm oil giant Felda Global Venture Holdings appears to be filling order books ahead of pricing its I.P.O. on Wednesday, in what would be the world's second-biggest offering this year, after Facebook.

headline.main: Felda Moving Ahead With $3.2 Billion I.P.O. in Malaysia
